tab1.text1:
This is a friendly server 
 ASA being in early access is buggy!


Crashes Happen. Pls contact an Admin if you have problems.

tab2.text1:
This server has plugins to enhance and make the game enjoyable 


Smalls Shop is accessed via F2

Quests are available, with varied rewards.

CheckStats /stats
ClaimReward /rewards 
CheckQuests /quests 
QuestDetails /quest 
CheckCompletedQuests /completed

Transfer to Another Map is possible, use the commands /upload and/download

MakeArkGreatAgain is also installed commands are
 Autofarm /farm 
Orp /setorp, /listorp, /orp


Please make sure you have linked your discord id to ingame id for bonuses and to use some parts of the plugins
